text:
A 33-year-old Russian tourist was on Sunday rescued from a deep snow-covered gorge by the Army soon after he fell into it in Gulmarg. “Dimitry Lobanov, along with five others of his group from Russia, was skiing in the higher reaches on Apharwat when he lost control and fell into a deep gorge covered with snow on Sunday,” Defence spokesman of Northern Command Col. S.D. Goswami said.

A team from the Army’s High Altitude Warfare School rescued the man and gave him first aid and support. — PTI
title: Army rescues Russian tourist from Gulmarg gorge
